When I was attending Brigham Young

9.94.text: I was given a unique opportunity

and as I told him about my life and my

27.84.text: he reached for his wifes hand and said

They're seated next to him was his wife

and her pure eyes sparkled like

hard work, of faithfully enduring trials with

75.37.text: On that day in Huntsville, Utah I was reminded of my divine identity and I

81.20.text: learned about what I now call deep beauty

92.14.text: It is the kind of beauty

98.60.text: It is the kind of beauty that doesn't wash off

103.62.text: when you are virtuous chased and moraly clean your inner beauty glows in your eyes and in your face

123.88.text: Young women, look into the mirror of eternity, remember who you are

129.13.text: See yourself as our Heavenly Father sees you. You are elect. You are of  noble birth
